name: Tumblr TEN
description: A dashboard theme, inspired by the look of OS X.

user.name: HellShe
user.about: If you can't catch me here, please try on tumblr. :)

additional_info:
My Tumblr is the best place to drop me a bug report and get a fast response. UPDATES: 2.2 - March 29. 2016 + fixed some design errors + added option "Additional Header Styles" for optional dark header icons or a dark header background
2.1 - Jun 2. 2015 + Changed some code so the "ask" and "post answer" buttons wont disappear anymore. + Fixed the size of the logo. + Fixed the position of the search drop-down. 2.0.7 - Apr. 18 2015 + Adjustments for the new dashboard. 2.0.1 - Feb 28 2015 + Bugfix 2.0 - Feb 22. 2015 + New code + "Modern" look and "Dock" + support for Firefox 1.9 - Nov 27. 2014 + fixes for the new layout 1.8.2 - Oct 15. 2014 + fixed for new search bar code + fixed messages with invisible text in message center 1.8.1 - Oct 12. 2014 + fixed invisible text when a list was used to answer a question 1.8 - Sep 28. 2014 + fixed some wrong positioned elements + a few design improvements + round avatars + new look for buttons + added option to choose between two gradients or an own image for background + added option to choose between white and grey post footers 1.7.2 - Aug 16. 2014 + fixes for tumblr changes 1.7.1 - July 19.2014 + fixed invisible quotes blocks 1.7 - July 17. 2014 + fixes for tumblr changes 1.6 - 11.6.2014 + fixed the look of recommended blog posts 1.5 - 1.6.2014 + removed the random two slashes next to the new posts panel + style now applies to the tracked tags page, too 1.4 - 1.5.2014 + fixed post links were not clickable near the header 1.3 - 22.4.2014 + corrected position of the tumblr logo dot 1.2 - 18.4.2014 + better alignment of the headers buttons + the options "tumblr" and "web" in the search bar will only appear while searching 1.1 - 30.3.2014 + improved colors + optimized the position of the permalink and the source + the red notifications won't bug into the next button anymore when showing 100+ notifications + added effects when you click on a button + restyled the login page + fixed a mistake with the posts shadows that caused the corners of posts look frayed 1.0 - 23.3.2014 - release -
